border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">做了什么，是简单地保存文件所做不到的呢？</span></b><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">从根本上讲，文件保存就是一个简化的版本控制系统，但坦率地说，它并不是一个好用的系统，因为它只能前进。当然，你也许会争论</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">撤消</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">按钮可以让你的文件回滚到以前的状态。但我们都清楚，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">撤消</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">按钮有其局限性，最明显示的是，在关闭文件时，文件的过去也随之丢失。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在某个快乐的日子，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally 
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">等来了她的编辑关于第一本书的反馈。他担心年轻的读者不想读一系列专写兽人故事的书，希望她在这个故事中引入一些精灵。关于这点，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally 
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">叹了口气，但很快意识到，她的精灵新角色将带来始料未及的冲突和曲折的情节。然后，她做了以下事情：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">·<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在第一本书中加入新角色，并修改故事情节。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">·<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">完成第一本书之后，对第二本书的故事情节，进行必要的修改。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">·<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所有的这些修改，导致她需要引入某个地理位置到第一本书中，而不是第二本书。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">·<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">重新编辑第一本书，让它包含新的地理位置。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">终于，她推开了她的键盘，确信已经把精灵融入到了她的奇幻世界之中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">你瞧，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">实际上在处理一个系统。她的两本书互相影响。角色、地理位置和故事情节在两本书中流动交织。然而，遗憾的是，一个月后，她的文件系统里什么都没有了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Word
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> “</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文档历史</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">工具，或她曾经粘贴在显示屏边缘用于记录修改过程的便签纸，将把所有的变化过程都揉合在一起。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">到目前为止，一切都还不错。但是，<b><span style="border:
none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm">如果</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Sally </span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">同时用到两台电脑工作，将会发生什么呢？</span></b><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">问得好。这时，就该用到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Github</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">了。注意，不要和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">混淆了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">获取</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">中的提交历史，并将其存储在互联网上，因此你可以从任一一台电脑访问它。你在本机（例如：你当前正在使用的电脑）<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm">推送（</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pushing</span></b><b><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">提交到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，然后，从另一台新的或不同的电脑上<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm">拉取（</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pulling</span></b><b><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Sally </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的工作流程。她在家里的台式电脑（左边，橘黄色的）上开启她一天的工作。接下来，她完成了几个章节的写作，又做了一些编辑工作，等等。整个过程中，她对工作总共进行了三次策略性的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">快照</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Git </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下午，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">常常喜欢带着她的笔记本电脑（上图中的右侧，蓝色的）去咖啡馆写作。今天也不例外。因此，在关闭家里的台式电脑之前，她需要确认当前的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Git </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">提交历史已<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm">推送（</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">push</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">到了在线</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Github</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-font-kerning:0pt">。一旦被上传到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">再如何酷，整个项目也只有她一人而已。<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm">工程团队要如何确保他们的工作不会重叠？</span></b></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简而言之，创建分支。将你的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">提交历史想像成一棵树。树的主干就是我们谈到的主分支。为了让团队成员避免彼此牵扯，他们在独立于他人的隔离区（在一个功能分支）进行工作，然而最终，每个人的工作成果都会被提交到主代码库</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">（主分支）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在，回到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Sally </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的例子。她加入了奇幻作家协会，在这里每个人都与他人合作完成这本书</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">《奇幻系列生物辞典》。这本辞典更像一本教材，由多个作者共同完成：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Tom </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Adam</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">让我们来看看《奇幻系列生物辞典》项目的在线</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">仓库，现在的情况是：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如上图所示，树的类比完全适用于奇幻作家协会在这个项目上的合作情况，仓库历史沿主分支向上移动。常规工作流始于每个作者为完成一个工作任务（例如编写章节内容，或排版章节）而在主分支上创建分支。只有当更改得到其他合作作家的批准时，分支才会被合并到主分支上（请谨记，主分支上的内容，才是最终要发布的内容）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当一个分支的内容<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm">合并（</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">merged</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">到主分支时，意味着该分支的内容会覆盖主分支上的。因此，现有内容的任何更改都将会替代之前的。当然，任何新添加的内容也会添加到主分支。实际上，当分支合并到主分支时，该分支的提交历史被添加到主分支提交历史的顶部。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然而，你可能正在思考：<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm">人们在本机的工作和之后才推送到</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github </span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的工作变更是如何连接到一起的呢？</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">关于这个问题，重点在于：你在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的远程仓库是你本机工作项目的一个镜像。这意味着，你在自己的电脑里存储了该项目（例如：一个已设置可进行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">提交的文件夹）的本地</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">仓库。在这个本地的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">仓库（再次，这是一个特定术语，指你的电脑里某个启用了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Git </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">功能的文件夹）中，你拥有与该项目相关的所有文件，在本文的例子中，即《奇幻系列生物辞典》。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">它的工作原理很像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Dropbox </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：你在不同的设备（你的家庭电脑、办公室电脑，等等）上创建本地文件夹，进行工作并更新这些文件。最后，这些操作被同步到网络上。然而，我们知道，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Git/Github
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">工作流还包含了一些额外的步骤。首先，你必须有意识地对某一时刻的工作执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">快照</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（即执行一次提交）。然后，你必须特意地推送这些提交（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">push</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。只有这样，你的工作才被同步到网络上的位置（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Github
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">版本库）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">既然如此，为什么不自动化该工作流呢？为什么不让它像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Dropbox</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一样，当你更新本地文件时，同时自动更新</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">上的文件？有很多理由让我们不这么做。最主要的理由是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——bugs </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">。同出版界一样，软件工程中也不是所有写过的东西都要保留。有时，你希望实验一下你的想法，如果实验失败，你希望有一种简单的方式能让工作快速回滚到之前的正确状态上。这也是为什么我们提倡这个经验法则，即在你试图用不同的方法编辑或实验之前，先对当前你希望保留的修改进行提交。频繁地提交小块工作有益无害，事实上，许多工程师为自己能做到这一点而感到自豪。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在，回到《奇幻系列生物辞典》。由于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">  Sally </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">对兽族有较深的了解，她被挑选为写兽族章节。但她不想在没有经过其它合作人员允许的情况下去修改这本书，于是，她创建了一个本地分支，并在该分支上进行写作和提交。然后，<b><span style="border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm">她将本地分支推送到</span></b></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

color:#2E2E2E;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github</span></b><span style="font-size:

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。像往常一样，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Github
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Sally </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-font-kerning:0pt">进行了更多的提交，并将它们推送到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的在线镜像分支。终于，她准备请</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Tom
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Adam </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">

color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上发布了一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，这是一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Github </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">功能，允许她解释该分支相对于主分支做了哪些修改。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Github
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">还提供了一个简易平台，合作人员可以在该平台上针对分支的修改内容进行讨论，并要求</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">

mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在分支合并到主分支之前对一些有异议的内容进行修改。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
